title: Responses from your WhatsApp Jewellery Campaign

conversation.text: Hi, what is the price of this jewellery set?
Hello Rajesh, thank you for your jewellery set?
The price of this exclusive jewellery set is ₹ 85,000. We have a special offer right now: you can get it at 15% off which brings the price down to ₹ 72,250.
Great, that's a good offer. Is the set available for immediate delivery?
